# Function to scrape search engine results for a given query
def scrape_search_results(query):

    results = requests.get("https://www.google.com/search?q=" + query)

    # Parse the HTML content of the results page
    soup = bs4. BeautifulSoup(results.text, "html.parser")

    # Extract the results from the HTML
    results_list = soup.find_all("div", class_="ZINbbc")

    # Create a list of results
    result_texts = []

    # Iterate over the results and add their text to the list
    for result in results_list:

    # Return the list of results
    return result_texts
